definition: and/furthermore/also/together with/(not) at all/simultaneously/to combine/to join/to merge
to send out/to show (one's feeling)/to issue/to develop/to make a bundle of money/classifier for gunshots (rounds)

sentences.english: Direct fetal injury is an infrequent complication of blunt trauma.
sentences.chinese: 胎儿直接损伤是钝器伤的罕见并发症。

sentences.english: Postoperative hemorrhage was main side effect for conization.
sentences.chinese: 宫颈锥切术主要的并发症是术后出血。

sentences.english: Infliximab and its side-effect profile are discussed, along with other associated complications.
sentences.chinese: 针对英利昔单抗的副作用和相关并发症进行了阐述。

sentences.english: Appendicitis can cause serious complications, such as
sentences.chinese: 阑尾炎可能引起严重的并发症。

sentences.english: Postoperative septic arthritis is an uncommon complication after anterior cruciate ligament reconstruction.
sentences.chinese: 前叉重建后感染性关节炎是一种罕见的并发症。

sentences.english: Endoscopic examination is indicated in cases of reflux esophagitis or other complications.
sentences.chinese: 有反流性食管炎或其他并发症时应行内镜检查。

sentences.english: They do not have the capabilities to treat this complication here.
sentences.chinese: 而在这个地方，医生没有能力治疗这种并发症。

sentences.english: Objective To study clinical presentations and complications of prolapse of gastric mucosa.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨胃黏膜脱垂症的临床表现及其并发症。

sentences.english: The cause was complications of cancer, his family said.
sentences.chinese: 其家人称，杨向中博士死于癌症并发症。

sentences.english: Measles can cause temporary complications, such as convulsions (fits) and diarrhoea.
sentences.chinese: 麻疹能引起暂时并发症，如惊厥和腹泻。

sentences.english: At the 6th month of treatment, the complications and prognosis of patients in all groups were evaluated.
sentences.chinese: 并于6个月对各组患者的并发症及预后进行评定。

sentences.english: There were no nonunion and other complications.
sentences.chinese: 无骨不连和其他并发症发生。

sentences.english: A fiver subcapsular hematoma is an extremely are complication of ESWL.
sentences.chinese: 肝脏被膜下血肿是此一手术极少见的并发症。

sentences.english: Objectives: To investigate the relation between obstetric complications and schizophrenia.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨母亲孕产期并发症与子代精神分裂症的关系。

sentences.english: The common complications and important death cause of IIR is the respiration function failure.
sentences.chinese: 呼吸功能衰竭是IIR的常见并发症和重要死亡原因。

sentences.english: No obvious change in pest-operative intelligence of the patients and few complications and sequela.
sentences.chinese: 术后智力未见明显改变，其并发症及后遗症少。

definition: chronic illness/disease that takes effect slowly
